H0.text: Metastasized is the term used to describe a cancer that has spread.

H1.text: Destabilized is the term used to describe a cancer that has spread.

H2.text: Galvanized is the term used to describe a cancer that has spread.

H3.text: Ostracized is the term used to describe a cancer that has spread.

A4.text: Metastasis is the spread of a pathogenic agent from an initial or primary site to a different or secondary site within the host's body; the term is typically used when referring to metastasis by a cancerous tumor.
